message.body: I got the plumbing tools. Do you have any use for that 4x6" steel posts from I house? I am going to sell or scrap them if not. They would make a beefy window or door lintel for sure
We could store them in shop basement I guess. I'm going to be working there at 10:30 through to 5 or so.
Plumbing tools I need at my house though. Do you still have a key?
I dropped the tools off at your house
Hey I think I left the wrench for my grinder at your shop. You didn't happen to see it did u? It's black with two spikes

Hey, if you can bring those iron posts up from the basement I will pick them up at 8am tomorrow. I may be able to use one for a window. I'll keep the rest if you want and if you need one or more later you can have them.
